attributes.action: All MP's should stop attempts to delay or prevent Article 50 from being signed.
attributes.background: MP's who voted to remain in the EU are refusing to accept the will of the majority and do not need to add amendments to the bill in order to delay or prevent its commencement and should desist from demanding oversight of the negotiations. They should agree to the voters' wishes or resign from office

rejection.details: This is a matter for individual MPs, not the Government or the House of Commons as a whole.
